com.cube.storm

Class UiSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cube.storm.UiSettings

  • public class UiSettings
extends Object
    This is the entry point class of the library. To enable the use of the library, you must instantiate a new UiSettings.Builder object in your Application singleton class. This class should not be directly instantiated.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UiSettings.Builder
      The builder class for UiSettings.

      • getIntentFactory

        public IntentFactory getIntentFactory()
        The intent factory instance of the module. This is the instance that will be used to resolve every activity/fragment for a storm page/Uri

      • setIntentFactory

        public void setIntentFactory(IntentFactory intentFactory)
        The intent factory instance of the module. This is the instance that will be used to resolve every activity/fragment for a storm page/Uri

      • getIntentResolver

        public IntentResolverMap getIntentResolver()
        Intent resolver used to resolving specific pages to an fragment/intent using either a page ID/Uri/descriptor. Intents registered here are prioritised over default resolutions from intentFactory

      • setIntentResolver

        public void setIntentResolver(IntentResolverMap intentResolver)
        Intent resolver used to resolving specific pages to an fragment/intent using either a page ID/Uri/descriptor. Intents registered here are prioritised over default resolutions from intentFactory

      • getViewProcessors

        public Map<Type,ViewProcessor> getViewProcessors()
        The view processor map used by ViewBuilder. Use UiSettings.Builder.registerType(Type, com.cube.storm.ui.lib.parser.ViewProcessor) to override the processor used to match models with json class names

      • setViewProcessors

        public void setViewProcessors(Map<Type,ViewProcessor> viewProcessors)
        The view processor map used by ViewBuilder. Use UiSettings.Builder.registerType(Type, com.cube.storm.ui.lib.parser.ViewProcessor) to override the processor used to match models with json class names

      • getUriResolvers

        public Map<String,Resolver> getUriResolvers()
        Uri resolver used to load a file based on it's protocol. You should not need to use this instance directly to load a file, instead use FileFactory which uses this to resolve a file and load it. Only use this if you want to load a specific scheme

      • setUriResolvers

        public void setUriResolvers(Map<String,Resolver> uriResolvers)
        Uri resolver used to load a file based on it's protocol. You should not need to use this instance directly to load a file, instead use FileFactory which uses this to resolve a file and load it. Only use this if you want to load a specific scheme

      • getViewResolvers

        public Map<String,ViewResolver> getViewResolvers()
        Maps class names with a view resolver object to resolve models/viewholders.
